function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and airflow control leading to poor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne contagious diseases spreading within the building.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of ventilation systems, implementation of air purifiers, and installation of HEPA filters.","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, air purifiers, and advanced ventilation monitoring systems.","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, and visitors.","Owner":"Building management and maintenance team."},{"Description":"Ineffective control of lighting systems leading to inadequate visibility and potential safety hazards.","Impact":"Increased risk of accidents and injuries due to poor lighting conditions.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of lighting systems, installation of backup lighting, and use of motion-activated emergency lighting.","Technologies":"Smart lighting controls, motion-activated emergency lighting, and backup power systems.","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, and visitors.","Owner":"Building management and maintenance team."},{"Description":"Inefficient cooling system maintenance leading to poor temperature control and potential discomfort for occupants.","Impact":"Increased risk of thermal discomfort and reduced productivity among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of cooling systems, implementation of temperature monitoring, and improvement of fault detection systems.","Technologies":"Advanced cooling system monitoring, predictive maintenance software, and temperature control sensors.","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, and visitors.","Owner":"Building management and maintenance team."}]}
